title: Dr. Sheila Patel
author: Dr Sheila Patel
description: Sheila Patel, M.D. is the Chief Medical Officer for Chopra and a board-certified family physician who is passionate about bringing holistic healing practices into the Western medical system. For more than a decade, she practiced full-spectrum family medicine, from prenatal care to ER coverage. As...
cleaned_text: Sattva On my personal journey in medicine, although I loved helping people in the conventional medical environment, over time practicing in the western medical paradigm became increasingly dissatisfying and not in alignment with why I became a doctor. One day, when I realized that I was calculating how many years until I could retire, I had an 'aha' moment where I decided that rather than stay in a job that was unsatisfying, or count the days until I could quit, I needed to make a change.
